trends: There have been no other sightings in Halsey
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI am not sure what I saw, it was unidentified, it was flying and it was something so on that basis alone I classify what I saw as a UFO. On December 24, 2011 at 1:34 AM. I was driving North on Hwy 99W in Oregon approximately a mile north of Twin Buttes Dr, Linn County, Oregon. The object in the front resembled an oversized and reversed jet engine the front glowed red. The object was ���cigar��� shaped approximately 30 feet in diameter and 100 -170 feet long. It was traveling at a very high rate of speed and made absolutely no noise. I stepped out of my car because I thought the object was going to crash as I exited my car I noted the time on my dash clock. Instead as it approached the hills to the west it turned up into the clouds and disappeared. As I was getting back into my car I noticed a man getting into a small (Ranger type) truck about 100 yards ahead of me, apparently he was reacting to the same thing. The man in the truck and I pulled alongside each other and he asked if I had seen what he had seen. I affirmed his sighting and he left.
Summary: Mysterious object flew directly infront of my car.
